structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXXIV. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY CITIZENS' TRANSPORTATION OVERSIGHT COMMITTEE

law.catch_line: Applicability of Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance.

text.section:
Sec. 2-1164. Applicability of Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance.
The Miami-Dade County Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance, of the Code of Miami-Dade County, Florida, shall be applicable to members of the Oversight Committee.
